home.title: Toulmin Diagram Builder
home.description: Build and export Toulmin argument diagrams

hero.title: Build stronger arguments visually
hero.description: Create, analyze, and share structured arguments using the Toulmin method. Make your reasoning clear, identify weak points, and persuade effectively.

featureSection.heading: Structured Argumentation
featureSection.description: The Toulmin model provides a framework for analyzing and constructing arguments, making complex reasoning more accessible and persuasive.

clarity.title: Clarity in reasoning
clarity.description: Break down complex arguments into clear, connected components that anyone can follow and understand.

persuasion.title: Better persuasion
persuasion.description: Strengthen your arguments by anticipating rebuttals and providing solid backing for your claims.

academic.title: Academic excellence
academic.description: Widely used in academic writing and critical thinking courses to develop and evaluate arguments.

visualize.title: Visualize and share
visualize.description: Create beautiful diagrams that can be easily shared, exported, and embedded in presentations or documents.

ctaSection.title: Ready to strengthen your arguments?
ctaSection.description: Join thousands of academics, students, and professionals who use our tool to build compelling arguments.
